title: SET_ENTITY_HEADING
content:
0xE0FF064D// SetEntityHeading
void SET_ENTITY_HEADING(Entity entity, float heading);Parameters:entity: The entity to set the heading for.heading: The heading in degrees.Set the heading of an entity in degrees also known as "Yaw".This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native SET_ENTITY_HEADING.
codeBlocks:
// SetEntityHeading
void SET_ENTITY_HEADING(Entity entity, float heading);

local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for SET_ENTITY_HEADING
SetEntityHeading(entity, 0.0)
